module.name: kinect2vector
module.description: Module based on \ref kinectClient "Kinect Wrapper Client" that convert the skeleton data into a plain vector. The positions are also made relative to the shoulder center.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Module based on \ref kinectClient "Kinect Wrapper Client" that convert the skeleton data into a plain vector. The positions are also made relative to the shoulder center. It requires the \ref kinectServer.

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
To specify if you are working with data replayed using datasetplayer instead of the kinect server. /isReplay

output.description: Broadcast a vector of joint position relative to the shoulder center. Only the closest player is used.
